betaAngleCalculation(SQLiteDatabase) - Method in class de.awi.floenavigation.services.AngleCalculationService
This function is called from AngleCalculationService.onHandleIntent(Intent) AngleCalculationService.beta angle is calculated from all the fixed stations DatabaseHelper.fixedStationTable w.r.t the origin fixed station AngleCalculationService.mmsi by subtracting AngleCalculationService.alpha from angle theta, which is the angle between the axis connecting origin and the fixed station and the longitudinal axis For origin fixed station AngleCalculationService.beta is not calculated Each AngleCalculationService.beta calculated is stored in each index of AngleCalculationService.beta Further the beta angles are averaged and stored in the database DatabaseHelper.betaTable
betaCursor - Variable in class de.awi.floenavigation.synchronization.BetaSync
Cursor used to loop through the database entries
betaData - Variable in class de.awi.floenavigation.synchronization.BetaSync
